about-me.description1: I am passionate about coding and like to find solutions to complex problems. With approx of 2 years of experience in the field, I have developed a skillset in frontend and backend code development, and I am always eager to learn and take on new challenges.
about-me.description2: My approach to development is analytical, and I believe that this is essential for success. I am dedicated to delivering high-quality work (on time) that meets the requirements while pushing the boundaries of what I can and know.
about-me.description3: In my free time, I like to spend time learning new things and experimenting, which helps to keep me inspired and motivated.
about-me.description4: If you are looking for a person who has "fire" for doing things, do not leave when it is hard, always give his best, and always strive to improve, I would love to hear from you.

project2.title: DRC Akkodis
project2.about: Web app for internal company use only that contains list of projects

modal.technologies: Java (v.11) with Spring, VueJS 2, AWS, Docker, BitBucket, Jira, Figma and etc.
modal.details: This application is intended to be used only by employees throughout the Modis/Akkodis global sales department. It is a platform where employees from all over the world can enter, search and view the won and completed projects, as well as check the specifics related to each project. For example: how many and what teams worked on it, how much time and money it cost, what technologies were used, what results were achieved, and etc.
modal.contribution: I have worked together with a team on this project. I have worked on backend and frontend, contributing to almost all functionalities in the application.
